mapper.select: SELECT teacher_name,courses_id,teacher_tab.teacher_id,courses_name,courses_introduce,courses_pricemoney,courses_click,courses_img_url,courses_grade,date_format(courses_date,'%Y-%m-%d')courses_date FROM courses_tab LEFT JOIN teacher_tab ON teacher_tab.teacher_id=courses_tab.teacher_id WHERE 1=1 AND courses_status = 8 order by courses_date DESC LIMIT 0,8

SELECT teacher_name,combo_id,combo_tab.teacher_id,combo_name,combo_introduce,combo_price,combo_imgs,date_format(combo_date,'%Y-%m-%d')combo_date FROM combo_tab LEFT JOIN teacher_tab ON combo_tab.teacher_id=combo_tab.teacher_id WHERE 1=1 AND combo_status = 8 order by combo_date DESC LIMIT 0,4
SELECT courses_id,courses_name,courses_click FROM courses_tab ORDER BY courses_click DESC LIMIT 0,10
SELECT courses_id,courses_name,courses_grade FROM courses_tab ORDER BY courses_grade DESC LIMIT 0,10
